summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; adding Article 13C and Sections 13C.1, 13C.2, 13C.3, 13C.4, 13C.5, 13C.6, 13.7 and 13C.8 to the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to establish a "Multiple Residence - Mixed Density" (RM-MD) Zone and amending Sections 2.2, 3.04, 4.1, 23.1 and 24.41 of said Zoning Ordinance to implement said new zone.
